### Project Setup

1.  Create a new project in RStudio called **Tidyverse**.
2.  Install the following packages:

```{r,eval=FALSE}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("cowplot")

## ggplot extensions and themes
install.packages("ggthemes")
install.packages("ggrepel")
install.packages("ggsci")
install.packages("ggpubr")
install.packages("patchwork")
install.packages("gghighlight")
install.packages("ggiraph")

## Colour pallettes
install.packages("viridis")
install.packages("RColorBrewer")

## Interactive plotting
install.packages("plotly")
```

### Data

Data for this session will be downloaded on the fly using tidyverse functions.

If you want to download the data manually, you can use the following code:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
## Create a directory to store the data
dir.create("data")

## Mac or Linux
download.file("http://bifx-core3.bio.ed.ac.uk/training/DSB/data/surveys_complete.csv", destfile = "data/sur
veys_complete.csv")

## Windows
download.file("http://bifx-core3.bio.ed.ac.uk/training/DSB/data/surveys_complete.csv", destfile = "data/sur
veys_complete.csv", mode = "wb")
```
